channel.title: Newcomer and totally lost
channel.description: I am a new student of networks, and i am very interested in cybersecurity, but i am quite lost, i feel quite overwhelmed in the sense that i feel that i lack much base knowledge, how networks, and operating systems works. Any tips of good books to cover my bases, i have TCP/IP illustred and networks a top down aproach in my backlog, but i really dont know any good books to help me truly understand how the OS and kernel work and how to exploit it.

item.title: Newcomer and totally lost
item.dc:creator: system
item.description:
This topic was automatically closed 3 days after the last reply. New replies are no longer allowed.

Read full topic

item.title: Newcomer and totally lost
item.dc:creator: jujufa
item.description:
I am a new student of networks, and i am very interested in cybersecurity, but i am quite lost, i feel quite overwhelmed in the sense that i feel that i lack much base knowledge, how networks, and operating systems works.
Any tips of good books to cover my bases, i have TCP/IP illustred and networks a top down aproach in my backlog, but i really dont know any good books to help me truly understand how the OS and kernel work and how to exploit it.
